str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
